displaytitle: Christ on the Way to Emmaus
dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 21.6 × 18.9 cm (8 1/2 × 7 7/16 in.)
inscribed:
Dated in plate, lower center: 1571

Inscribed in plate, lower left and center: P. BRVEGEL INVENTOR / P. GAL. FI. 

Printed below plate, from left to right: CHRISTE PEREGRINI DIGANRIS SVMERE FORMAM, / VT FIRMA SOLIDES PECTORA NOSTRA FIDE. Lvc. 24.

titles.title: Christ on the Way to Emmaus

caption: Philip Galle (1537–1612; born Haarlem, Netherlands; died Antwerp, Belgium), after Pieter Bruegel the Elder (ca. 1525–1569; born Breda, Netherlands; died Brussels, Belgium), Christ on the Way to Emmaus, 1571. Engraving; 21.6 × 18.9 cm (plate, sheet trimmed to plate). Bequest of Charles A. Ryskamp (2010-142)
